extra.event: You find an energy drink. And it hasn't even expired! This must be your lucky day. It was even cooled by the river.
There are some inscriptions on the wall. It was crudely carved in the stone. It reads: "Not cool, José, not cool".
You find an energy drink. And it hasn't even expired! This must be your lucky day.
You find a tombstone. Time has weathered the inscription, but you can read: Here li..s Fre..r..ic Ma.. May he find more luck in the afterlife. Last words: "Oh, hi, cute bunny".

entrance.text: There's a steep descent and it's looking petty dark.
Light trickles through and you see the sound of water nearby.
There's some low hanging roots, and some bugs crawling around. There's a dark in front of you.
You shake off the bugs and whatever else was creeping up on you, and you enter a more lit tunnel.
There's a cave in the side of the hill.
You smell the fresh air, and you have a nice view of the surroundings.
It goes even further down, and the sound of the river is getting fainter with every step.
You're not out of this place yet. The air is damp and silent. At least you're going back up.
It goes even further down, and the air is damp.
You feel a little more confident now that it's rising again.

extra.event: Greetings traveller. What brings you to this place of evil? Dark secrets lurk here, which no man should ever lay their gaze on.
A heavy storm comes up, and you get lost in the sounds of thunder. You must've wandered off course.

dungeonMap.layer: oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooooooooooo-oo ooooooooooooooooo-oo oooooooooooooooo--oo oooooooooooooooo-ooo oooooooooooooooo-ooo oooooooooooooooo-ooo oooooooooooooooo-ooo ooooooooooooooo--ooo oooooooooooooo--oooo ooo-ooooooooo--ooooo ooo-----------oooooo oooooooooooooooooooo

oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooo-oooooooooo ooooooooo-oooooooooo ooooooo---oooooooooo ooooooo-oooooooooooo ooooo---oooooooooooo oooo--oooooooooooooo ooo--ooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooo

entrance.text: You see a cave.
The light hurts your eyes.
You see that it goes even deeper.
You recognise this. Almost there.
This is a cave entrance
You come out of the cave

dungeonMap.layer: oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooooooooo--ooooooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooooooooo-oooooooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooooooooo--ooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooo-ooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooo---ooooooooooooooooooooooo ooooooooooooo--ooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooo--oooooooooooooooooo-ooooooo oooooooooooo-oooooooooooooooooo--ooooooo oooooooooooo-ooooooooooooooooo--oooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo-ooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo-ooooooooo ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo--ooooooooo ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo-oooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooo--oooooooooo ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo-oooooooooo ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo-oooooooooo ooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo--ooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

extra.event: You feel you are nearing something important. The air is full with it. All of a sudden, you are besieged by a bunny possessed with anger, its eyes engulfed in flame, and mouth frothing.

In the magnificent view of where you're standing, you see a shiny blade, redirecting the sunlight into your eyes. It is a magnificent blade indeed, and it tingles are you fit your hand around it. It has the symbol of a bunny with fiery eyes engraved in it.

entrance.text: The cave suddenly takes a steep descent, and the sound of the water gives you an estimate of how far down the rabbit hole goes.
There's a steep slippery slope, it'll be tricky getting up there.
Covered by some dead leaves and dirt, you discover a tunnel leading into darkness.
You try not to think about all the insects squirming in the barrier of dirt and rotting leaves separating you from fresh air.
You are under the mountain now. The stones are cold, the silence broken only by the water escaping from the stalagtites.
It's cold here, and the puddles make it tricky to walk.
There's water in some spots, and the air smells foul.
It's a little less scary than where you came from.
Gradually it goes further down, and you see the difference in stone layer.
Ahead is a straight tunnel, more of what you've seen previously.
There's a steep ascent, and you hear the soft rumbling of water nearby.
It's a dark, damp hole back down, but it's your only option.
There's little other option but go back down here.
The light at the end of the tunnel hurts your eyes, but it makes you happy nonetheless.
You fall through a hole and end up in a natural cave.
There are some roots you can pull yourself back up with through the hole.

extra.event: Someone seems to have used this as a shelter. You find a flask of water.
There is a silhouette visible in the corner, and a slight snorting.
There are some cloven bones lying around. Some are more fresh than others.
A trail of dried blood is visible in the murky sand. Vague footprints reveal only three legs. A wounded predator is all the more dangerous..
This seems to be the remaining skeleton of a fallen warrior. This must be Darius. He seems to be holding a Paper Scroll, still tightly gripped is his hand.

entrance.text: A small hollowed out cave appears in the side of the hill.
As you exit the cave you have a nice view of the river flowing beneath you.
Suddenly a ladder is lowered next to you, and the friendly face of a woman greets you.
You are carefully inspecting the ladder, trying to find a way not to fall down.
You see a small cavern, whose entrance is shrouded by moss and overhanging leaves.
Faint light is able to pierce through twigs and leaves. You feel some fresh air blowing inwards.
